custom_css: p {font-family: DM Sans; font-size: 0, 950rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; line-height: normal;}
strong {padding: 0 10px; margin-left: 0.25rem; align-items: center; border-radius: 1rem; text-align: center; font-size: 0.875rem; font-style: normal; border: 1px solid white;}

settings.announcement_text: -20% sur tout le site jusqu'à dimanche minuit. code: CARDS20

custom_css: @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {.live-search-button, .live-search-button:hover {background-color: inherit; } .live-search, .live-search-form {width: fit-content; } .live-search-form {margin-left: auto; } .form-field-input, .live-search, .live-search-form {border-radius: 1.5rem; } .live-search-button {border: none; box-shadow: none; color: #1f1f1f; } .form-field-input:focus-visible, form-field-input:focus, form-field-input:focus-within {border: 0 solid #000; }}

Contactez notre service client par mail
